page.title: 14FACTS ABOUT HORSINGTON.
page.content: Mr John Cross is a retired man who has written a book on the Horsington area. On the 9th of May Michael and Shelley went to his house to ask him some questions.Mr John Cross has lived in the area for 27 years.In the last 5 years 16 houses roughly have been built.About 540 people live in the Horsington area.About 100 children under 16 live in the area.Most of the children go to Horsington school but others board.Mr Cross goes to the shops about once a week he thinks the shoping area is quite big.There are about 2 road accidents a year.Mr Cross thinks there is only 1 burglary each year.We asked Mr Cross are there many buses around the area he thinks about 1 or 2 buses a day. He uses a van and a car for his transport.
